title.rendered: Alticor Inc Receives AGC 2020 Construction Safety Excellence Award

content.rendered:
Associated General Contractors (AGC) announced that Alticor Inc has once again shown an unwavering dedication to safety, earning them a 2020 Construction Safety Excellence Award. Jerry Shupe, Corporate Director of Safety and Health, was presented with a second place CSEA during AGC’s annual national convention last week.

The AGC National Construction Safety Excellence Awards Program recognizes construction companies who excel at safety performance. The CSEA closely examines each candidate’s commitment to safety and occupational health management and risk control. Unlike other safety award programs that limit the criteria to frequency rates, the CSEA selection process is considerably more comprehensive. Each application is reviewed for evidence of company management commitment, active employee participation, safety training, work site hazard identification and control, and safety program innovation​.

To learn more about Alticor Inc’ continued dedication to safety, visit: https://www.henselphelps.com/the-hensel-phelps-way/safety/
